main.name: Fabian Van Wyk
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: Hi there! I am Fabian! You might also know me as fabbaReact. I've been coding for 1year As a Full Stack developer.I working build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. With this passion, I have now trained few developers across the country. Through live coaching sessions online/social platforms showing how to apply developer skills in a range of cool builds and challenges. I deliver REAL VALUE by teaching REAL WORLD projects to help students enter the world of web development. Youâ€™ll get hands-on experience and learn the skills that are required to succeed in the real-world in this community.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the Namakwa_Dev fam!

work.title: Founder and co CEO
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the Dev fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Fabba is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Fabba has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
